import React from 'react' import styles from '../style/modal.module.scss'; import heart from '../icons/heart.svg'; import eye from '../icons/eye.svg'; import logoCinema from '../icons/logoFile.svg'; function CardMovieModal({ similarMovie }) { let backgroundImage = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/" + similarMovie.backdrop_path return (
{similarMovie.vote_count} {similarMovie.vote_average + "K"}

{similarMovie.release_date}

{similarMovie.title}

) } export default CardMovieModal
